a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with alcohol use disorder vs. drug use disorder

Share of the population with an alcohol use disorder versus the share with
drug use disorder
(which does not
include alcohol or tobacco smoking). Drug use disorders include opioids, cocaine, amphetamine and cannabis.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
